title: Pixel 3XL touch screen suddenly doesn't work. Restarted,PIN required but number 1, 4, 7 don’t work.
content: Phone worked fine but suddenly touchscreen wasn’t responsive. Reboot the phone. pin required. Cannot log in because number 1, 4 and 7 don’t work while the rest of numbers work. Tried safe mode, still not work. Any ideas might solve the problem so that I can log into the phone?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
